thread.title: This Is What Beyoncé Changed Into After Her Epic Performance at the Grammys
thread.title_full: This Is What Beyoncé Changed Into After Her Epic Performance at the Grammys

title: This Is What Beyoncé Changed Into After Her Epic Performance at the Grammys
text: By Sally Holmes Feb 12, 2017 Tonight, Beyoncé skipped the Grammys red carpet, which means we didn't get to see what the singer would be wearing for her first appearance since announcing that she's pregnant with twins until she was on stage. For her epic performance , Bey wore a super sparkly gold number designed by former Roberto Cavalli creative director Peter Dundas: Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below And she was still wearing that when she accepted the award for Best Urban Contemporary Album for Lemonade . But when she sat back down in her seat next to husband Jay Z and daughter, Blue Ivy, she'd changed into another sparklefest of a dress, this time in red: Getty
